MAN.TITLE: save_graph
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: saves a graph in a file

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : string, the path of the graph to save

DESCRIPTION.SP: save_graph saves the graph g in a graph file. path is the name of the graph file where the graph will be saved. path can be the name or the pathname of the file; if the "graph" extension is missing in path, it is assumed. If path is the name of a directory, the name of the graph is used as the name of the file.
DESCRIPTION.P: Standard save function may also be used to save a graph in a file. In this case take care to save only a single graph data structure in the file (without any other variable) if you want to reload this file with load_graph or edit_graph.
